name: help
description: The help command to list out all the commands that are currently registered with Quick Commands.

name: update
description: A quick function to update Quick Commands to the latest version in git.

name: cd
description: A collection of specific shortcuts to cd to.

commands.name: code
commands.description: Navigate to the directory where you keep all of your code.

name: git
description: Additional git commands beyond the standard git commands, and git aliases.

commands.name: fcp
commands.description: Full Commit and Push: Create a new branch, adds everything, creates a commit, and pushes to origin.
args: branch: The branch name to use with this push.
message: The commit message for this full commit.

commands.name: undo
commands.description: Undo: Undoes the most recent $3 changes.
args: number: The number of commits to remove from the branch.
